message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I believe $14,000 is a fair price considering the value it offers, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11,500?
